definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: So tell me about on the job training .
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我在職訓練的一些事情吧。

sentences.english: I was impressed with the company's emphasis on in-service training.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司對員工在職訓練的重視，令我印象深刻。

sentences.english: We didn't have any pre-job or on-the-job training.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有任何職前或在職訓練。

sentences.english: Currently employed personnel shall participate in the in-service training every three years.
sentences.chinese: 在職人員應每三年參加在職訓練。

sentences.english: Internships built into many of these degrees look suspiciously like old-fashioned on-the-job training.
sentences.chinese: 這些學位的實習看起來像過時的在職訓練。
